mapper.insert: insert into medical_skill_content (medical_skill_content_id, medical_skill_content_name, medical_skill_content_detail, medical_skill_content_father, medical_skill_content_extra,medical_skill_content_unit, medical_skill_content_price,medical_skill_content_explain) values(#{medical_skill_content_id}, #{medical_skill_content_name}, #{medical_skill_content_detail}, #{medical_skill_content_father}, #{medical_skill_content_extra}, #{medical_skill_content_unit}, #{medical_skill_content_price}, #{medical_skill_content_explain})
mapper.update: update medical_skill_content set medical_skill_content_name = #{medical_skill_content_name}, medical_skill_content_detail = #{medical_skill_content_detail}, medical_skill_content_father = #{medical_skill_content_father}, medical_skill_content_extra = #{medical_skill_content_extra}, medical_skill_content_unit = #{medical_skill_content_unit}, medical_skill_content_price = #{medical_skill_content_price}, medical_skill_content_explain = #{medical_skill_content_explain} where medical_skill_content_id = #{medical_skill_content_id}
